protocol.text: Seed was imbibed 24 h on 0.8% water-agar with or without 1 uM KAR1 at 20C under 100 uE white light.
Primary dormant seed was collected from plants grown in continuous light (100 uE) and stored at -80C to preserve dormancy. Distinct seed batches were harvested and assayed.

Total RNA was extracted from seed using Ambion RNAqueous kit with Plant RNA Isolation Aid. Before column purification, solubilized seed mixture was extracted with chloroform:isoamyl alcohol (24:1) to further remove polysaccharide and phenolic contaminants. RNA quality was confirmed using Agilent BioAnalyzer RNA 6000 Nano chips.
Biotinylated cRNA was prepared using Affymetrix Gene Expression 3' Amplification one cycle target labeling kit with 7 ug total RNA using manufacturer's protocol.

Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450 with GeneChip Hybridization Wash and Stain Kit.
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner and Affymetrix GCOS software.
The data were analyzed with Avadis software using standard GC-RMA normalization.
